name: latextailor
description: A versitile primitives to prune the latex source code.

commands.title: Convert LaTex: multi(align) to equation
commands.description: Convert LaTeX multline and align environments to equation environments.

commands.title: Convert LaTex: algorithm uppercase to lowercase
commands.description: Convert LaTeX uppercase algorithm environments to lowercase from STATE to State

commands.title: Convert LaTex: algorithm lowercase to uppercase
commands.description: Convert LaTeX lowercase algorithm environments to uppercase from State to STATE

commands.title: Convert LaTex: frac to inline division
commands.description: Convert LaTeX frac{a}{b} to inline division a / b

commands.title: Convert LaTex: inline division to frac
commands.description: Convert inline division a / b to LaTeX frac{a}{b}

commands.title: Convert LaTex: math display to inline
commands.description: Convert LaTeX math display environments to inline math environments

commands.title: Convert LaTex: remove emph macro
commands.description: Removes the emph{} command while preserving the text inside it

commands.title: Convert LaTex: remove theorem environment info
commands.description: Removes the optional title/info brackets from theorem, lemma, corollary, and definition environments
